channel.title: Which is easyer to host a server on Vista or normal windows?
channel.description: i need to know this cus i set up for 317 and no one could join so. ineeda know.

item.title: Which is easyer to host a server on Vista or normal windows?

item.description:
@system wrote:

Its easiest to host the server on windows Xp Because it has fewer glitches then Vista

item.title: Which is easyer to host a server on Vista or normal windows?
item.dc:creator: @Asante213 Asante213
item.description:
@Asante213 wrote:

It doesn’t depend on the OS although Windows Vista is has MANY more bugs…it depends on the what you have in the inside…like the processor for example.

item.source: Which is easyer to host a server on Vista or normal windows?

item.title: Which is easyer to host a server on Vista or normal windows?
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

The Chubby Bunny:

There’s no such thing as normal windows

He means Windows XP and why post not answering his question?

You can host a server on Windows XP or Windows Vista, I don’t think either runs a server better than the other. From experience I like to use Windows XP to host a server and play around with the files because stuff is easier to find and I just like the overall interface better than Vista and Vista is more buggier. I’d roll with XP but it depends of what you like.

Read full topic
item.source: Which is easyer to host a server on Vista or normal windows?
